attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we should abolish parole as people are murdering, raping, molesting children and only serving half a sentence when these animals should be in prison for their full sentence. how many times have you heard or read that a prisoner on parole has re-offended. its about time this stopped.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
